basics.name: Fabricio Céspedes Gómez
basics.label: Fullstack Developer
basics.summary: Fullstack Developer with experience in REACT, JS, TS, Tailwindcss, Supabase, Strapi, GraphQL, REST API NextJS, NodeJS. Also experienced in languages such as C# and Java.

work.name: Sistemas Ágil
work.summary: I am currently part of the development and customer service team at Sistemas Ágil. Here, I am 100% responsible for the website and also participate in the development of the POS system they offer, which is developed in C#. In addition to development, I am responsible for testing improvements or fixes made by my teammates. I created a chat bot with ai, which is connected to a database of a supermarket, where it can be consulted by metrics and graphs of sales, products, sales by customer and more.

work.name: REGAM Parts & Equipment
work.summary: I created a system for a web catalog, which includes a dashboard for administrators and a page where customers can view the offered products. This application was developed using REACT and Firebase as SaaS, implementing the Mobile First approach for both the dashboard and the customer view. Additionally, in the same project, I was responsible for overseeing the operations carried out by the customer service team. I was also part of the sales team, gaining experience in customer acquisition, communication ease, negotiation skills, and more.

work.name: Sergio Alfaro Publicidad y Fotografía
work.summary: Project leader for web development projects, specializing in building interactive dashboards, landing pages, product catalogs, web menus, and other related applications. These projects were developed using modern frameworks such as REACT, ASTRO, and NextJS, ensuring high performance, scalability, and a seamless user experience.

projects.name: Basic POS System
projects.description: Basic POS system, developed with REACT and Supabase. The database information is consumed using GraphQL.

projects.name: AI Supermarket Chat Bot
projects.description: AI chatbot connected to a supermarket database displaying sales metrics and graphs.

projects.name: Naque.cr
projects.description: Real state properties catalog, using Strapi and GraphQL.
